EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Point of Contact (1365458158.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Point of Contact (1365458158.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Matt, Ok sounds good. I just wanted to ensure you were not directly sent from Booz, if you were I would have sent you to our Account Manager for BAH. Since you are not sure which sub you will use I will be your point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: matthew berriman [mailto:mberri@aol.com] Sent: Monday, April 08, 2013 5:20 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners Point of Contact Sara, I am quite new to the MBO experience, not sure how this works. I have been an IC in Afghanistan and have an LLC, but was told to "get on MBO" and possibly work with Booz Allen since they have many of the IO/MISO/SC positions - but not sure of the process. Matthew -----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: matthew berriman <mberri@aol.com <mailto:mberri@aol.com>> Sent: Mon, Apr 8, 2013 11:10 am Subject: RE: MBO Partners Point of ContactHi Matthew, Thank you so much for this information. Are you working through a government subcontractor? I want to make sure I get you to the correct Account Manager if there is a sub involved. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlNcp1V%2Fy%2F2WLufukDiqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlNcp1V%2Fy%2F2WLufukDiqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlNcp1V%2Fy%2F2WLufukDiqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlNcp1V%2Fy%2F2WLufukDiqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: matthew berriman [mailto:mberri@aol.com <mailto:mberri@aol.com?>] Sent: Monday, April 08, 2013 4:13 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Point of Contact Thank you for the quick reply. I am currently on active duty / mobilized reservist in HQ USPACOM, coming off of orders in 90 days. JSOU staff mentioned I should pursue involvement with the MBO program since I will be taking a battalion command and will need some flexibility but can still add value as a subject matter expert to IO/MISO activities. Able to contribute to global JSOU missions (travel is ok) or participate in IO/MISO activities here in Hawaii. Matthew -----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlNcp1V%2Fy%2F2WLufukDiqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> To: mberri <mberri@aol.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:mberri@aol.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlNcp1V%2Fy%2F2WLufukDiqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> Sent: Mon, Apr 8, 2013 6:16 am Subject: MBO Partners Point of ContactDear Matt, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. May I ask what client referred you? I want to be sure I get you to the correct contact. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlNcp1V%2Fy%2F2WLufukDiqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlNcp1V%2Fy%2F2WLufukDiqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlNcp1V%2Fy%2F2WLufukDiqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlNcp1V%2Fy%2F2WLufukDiqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners!
